Social Media

Social Media Management and Social Media Course

Currently, 3.6 billion people use social media worldwide. By 2025, projections say that number of users will increase to 4.41 billion. How do I reach them? Social media has unleashed a global audience. We can become whatever we want and we can achieve everything we want. With social media, our reach is limitless, therefore we are limitless.

Social Media Management

Everyone loves seeing beautiful content, and in our current digital era, your content needs to be mind-blowing to even get noticed. Always producing fresh and quality content, that appeals to your niche, can sometimes be a burden. We're here to carry this burden, so you can focus on other aspects of your business.

Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, Twitter

We handle all photography and edits. We create fun and engaging stories, along with copywriting (any text information) supported by niche-focused hashtags that captivate your audience. Our content creation is specific for social media platforms like Facebook, Instagram, TikTok and Twitter.

Social Media Course

You know where you want to go when it comes to your online presence, but you need support in getting there. We give step-by-step guidance on how to build your social media platforms and how to produce your own content that will transform your social media presence. Our Online course is via video call or in person. You can book classes here.

E-book on TikTok

Within 6 months, founders of King Code were able to grow their TikTok account to over half a million followers. They've learnt a few lessons along the way and understand the algorithm well. They'll be releasing an e-book soon on Candy and the King.
